short_summary: Request for construction service for the construction of one and two dwelling buildings, warehouses and industrial buildings, multi dwelling buildings and other buildings.
description: This notice for the procurement of construction services has been cancelled.
full_summary:
### Cancelled Tender: AR22SLHX

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Title (English):** Cancelled - AR22SLHX
* **Tender Title (French):** Annulé - AR22SLHX
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01015954
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** AR22SLHX
* **Publication Date:** December 6, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** March 31, 2026, 2:00 PM AST
* **Amendment Date:** December 7, 2022

#### Tender Status

This tender is currently **Cancelled**.

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** United States, Canada, Europe, Mexico
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name (English):** Defence Construction Canada
* **Contact Information:**
  * **Name:** Smith, Mark
  * **Email:** mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
  * **Phone:** 613-859-0549

#### Description of Tender

This tender notice has been cancelled.

#### Disclaimer

Prior to tender closing, interested parties should not proceed with any preparation or procurement of goods and services in anticipation of having been selected for this tender. Definitive contract award, if any, will be made by a process conducted entirely in accordance with the provisions of the prevailing Government of Canada contracting authorities. An offer is a commitment by the bidder to adhere to the conditions undertaken during the bidding process if selected. The contracting authority is not responsible for any liability or obligation incurred prior to the award of the contract. Definitive contract award will be based on the evaluation criteria laid out in the specific Request for Proposal (RFP). Everyone who is interested in participating in the procurement should send the request for the RFP to the contracting entity. Offerors are invited to submit an offer unless otherwise indicated by the contract strategy. Danceavurance specific opening date and time with black space and/or bold font. Please ensure that the offer contains all required contested field for certification of supplier(s) selected/full Form that other requires. Please provided soft part plus shared interest-term
